knimeNode.name: Credential Variable Extractor
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node extracts the content of a selected credentials variable

intro.p: This node extracts the username from a selected workflow credentials variable.
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: Select the name of the user credentials set. User credentials can be created by right clicking on the name of the open workflow in the KNIME Explorer pane and selecting 'Workflow Credentials...'

ports.outPort: Flow variables with added 'username' flow variable
